Title: Designates crimes of manslaughter that result in the death of a child class A-1 felonies
Summary: Designates crimes of manslaughter as class A-1 felonies when a defendant recklessly or with the intent to cause physical injury causes the death of a child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to designating crimes of manslaughter that result in the death of a child class A-1 felonies
